resource.chars:
41 North Bank 
Regents Park 
April 7th 1852 
Having carefully studied 
Messrs Embleton & Hancocks’ paper 
upon Doris: I beg to express a 
most decided opinion in 
favour of its being published 
in the Philosophical Transactions:
1st. because it contains a 
number of facts new not only 
as respects the genus Doris - but 
the Mollusca generally:
2ndly because as a man of
